title: S3 Ep45: Post-pandemic transport policy
itunes:title: Post-pandemic transport policy
description: In the UK, public transport use has remained low after lockdown - but car use is almost back to pre-pandemic levels. What does this mean for a sustainable transport policy? David Newbery tell Tim Phillips how we could tax and incentivise ways to get around after the pandemic.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
